name: Extraordinary Managed Services
description: Extraordinary Managed Services Limited is an established managed services provider focused on designing and managing bespoke cloud infrastructure for Software as a Software (SaaS) companies. We let software companies focus on coding and solving their customers' problems - while we manage your cloud platforms. We build long term customer relationships that allow our high calibre staff get to know your business and your systems.

locations.address: 6 The Clocktower Estate Flassches Yard South Gyle
